00026 static void gob_t(void* par,
00027                   const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00028                   const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX, 
00029                   complex double* t, gradGaussian* dt)
00030 {       
00031   int i;
00032   double m;
00033 
00034   m = 0.5/mass(G1->xi);
00035 
00036   *t += m* (3*X->lambda + X->pi2)* X->Q;
00037 
00038   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00039     dt->chi[i] += m* X->T* dX->dS.chi[i]* (3*X->lambda + X->pi2)* X->R;
00040   dt->a += m* X->T* X->S* ((3*dX->dlambda + dX->dpi2.a)* X->R +
00041                            (3*X->lambda + X->pi2)*dX->dR.a);
00042   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00043     dt->b[i] += m* X->T* X->S* (dX->dpi2.b[i]* X->R +
00044                                 (3*X->lambda + X->pi2)* dX->dR.b[i]);
00045 }

00049 void calcgradT(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00050                const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00051                gradSlaterDet* dt)
00052 {
00053   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_t = {opt: 1, par: NULL, me: gob_t};
00054 
00055   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_t, dt);
